name: Gangster Baby Renamer Bot
description: Advanced Telegram File Renamer Bot for 4GB Files with Enhanced Security and Monitoring

CHANNEL.description: Channel or Group user Name With @ (e.g., @my_channel)

ADMIN.description: Add Your User ID for administrative access

DB_URL.description: Database URL. Get it from MongoDB

DB_NAME.description: Name of the database to be used

LOG_CHANNEL.description: Channel ID for storing logs and file operations. Get your channel ID from Rose @MissRose_bot

LAZY_PIC.description: Start-up picture of your bot. Get it from telegraph_Bot

ENABLE_MONITORING.description: Enable real-time monitoring with services like New Relic or Datadog

SECURITY_KEY.description: Security key for encrypting environment variables
